name.description: Specifies the name of the Certificate. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Certificate is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

automation_account_name.description: The name of the automation account in which the Certificate is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

base64.description: Base64 encoded value of the certificate.

description.description: The description of this Automation Certificate.

is_exportable.description: The is exportable flag of the certificate.

create.description: Used when creating the Automation Certificate.

update.description: Used when updating the Automation Certificate.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Automation Certificate.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Automation Certificate.
